landing__meta__title: reece-start - Sveltekit + Go project start template
landing__meta__description: reece-start is a Sveltekit + Go project start template that comes out of the box with auth, billing, and more so you can skip the boilerplate and ship your idea from day one
landing__hero__title:
Pre-packaged with everything you need to build,
reece-start is how you skip the boilerplate and start shipping
landing__features__title: Everything you need to build and scale
landing__features__subtitle: Focus on your unique value proposition while we handle the infrastructure
landing__tech_stack__subtitle: A carefully curated tech stack that scales with your business
landing__cta__title: Ready to skip months of development?
landing__cta__subtitle: Start building your SaaS with a solid foundation. No more reinventing the wheel.
no_organization__select_organization: Select an organization to continue to the app.
no_organization__no_organizations__descr: You aren't a member of any organizations. Get started by creating or joining your first organization.
no_organization__invitation__invitation_: By accepting, you will be added to the organization, and you will be able to collaborate with your team.
no_organization__invitation__accepted__t: This invitation has already been accepted.
no_organization__invitation__accepted__d: If you did not accept this invitation, please contact the organization owner for a new invitation.
no_organization__invitation__declined__t: This invitation has already been declined.
no_organization__invitation__declined__d: If you would like to join this organization, please contact the organization owner for a new invitation.
no_organization__invitation__expired__de: If you would like to join this organization, please contact the organization owner for a new invitation.
no_organization__invitation__revoked__ti: This invitation has already been revoked.
no_organization__invitation__revoked__de: If you would like to join this organization, please contact the organization owner for a new invitation.
create_organization_pages__descriptions_: Let's start with the basics. Give your organization a name. You can also add a logo and description if you would like.
You can always change this information later!

Now, we need to know how to contact your organization. We'll use this information to send you important updates and notifications. We may also use this information to confirm your identity and keep your account secure.
Next, we need to know where your organization is located. This will be displayed on invoices, used to calculate taxes, and more.
If your address changes, you can always update it later!
We need some final details about your organization. We need this information to ensure legal compliance and provide you the best possible experience.
Lastly, let's review the details of your organization to make sure everything is correct!
faq__meta__description: Get answers to frequently asked questions about the tech stack, architecture, and features.
faq__questions__why_svelte__answer: Modern react libraries are far too complicated. Nowadays many are VC backed and want you to use their cloud hosting service which introduces even more complexity. At the same time, SvelteKit provides a nicer interface for reactive UIs and supports impler data loading and mutation patterns.
faq__questions__why_daisyui__answer: I thought it was neat and easy to use. If you don't like DaisyUI styles, you can always defined your own components and ignore DaisyUI altogether.
faq__questions__why_go__answer: Go has what I need for most of my projects: minimal resource usage, fast build times, simple developer experience.
faq__questions__why_postgresql__answer: Would you prefer I use DB2, MongoDB? Postgres is fast, easily available, and generally a good SQL database.
faq__questions__why_railway__answer: I'm lazy. Maybe in the future I'll use uncloud or k8s, but railway works fine and is cheap.
faq__questions__why_custom_auth__questio: Why custom authentication instead of Auth0 or Clerk?
faq__questions__why_custom_auth__answer: My authentication models have always slightly difered from Auth0 or Clerk which has resulted in time wasted trying to make them work for my use case. Here you own the auth model so you can hack it to your hearts content with minimal issues. For example, this enables B2B2B models.
faq__questions__what_is_org_model__answe: There are organizations, and users. Organizations own resources and users must be a member of the organization to access or modify the resource.
faq__questions__why_makefile__question: Why use a Makefile for development?
faq__questions__how_to_start__question: How do I get started with development?
faq__questions__how_to_start__answer: Clone the repo and open your text editor.
faq__questions__without_orgs__question: Can I use this without the organization features?
faq__questions__without_orgs__answer: Yes, you will just need to remove organizations from the codebase.
faq__questions__add_oauth__question: How do I add new OAuth providers?
faq__questions__add_oauth__answer: The project includes Google OAuth as an example. To add new providers, update the OAuth configuration in the backend, add the provider-specific endpoints, and create corresponding frontend sign-in buttons. The authentication system is designed to support multiple OAuth providers simultaneously.
faq__questions__other_platforms__questio: Can I deploy this to other platforms besides Railway?
faq__questions__other_platforms__answer: Yes, there is nothing specific to railway here.
faq__questions__billing_included__answer: Yes, Stripe is included and comes with a subscription-based model by default.
pricing__meta__description: Choose the perfect plan for your business. Start free or upgrade to our Pro plan for advanced features.
pricing__hero__subtitle: Start for free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees, no surprises.
pricing__free__description: Everything you need to get started
pricing__pro__description: For people who like giving us money
pricing__pro__features__pride: A sense of pride and accomplishment
pricing__pro__features__warm: The warm fuzzy feeling of supporting developers
pricing__pro__features__exclusive: Exclusive access to... the same features
pricing__pro__features__badge: A "Pro" badge that literally does nothing
pricing__pro__features__priority: Priority support for features that don't exist
pricing__pro__features__advanced: Advanced nothing, but with extra steps
pricing__faq__change_plans__question: Can I change plans at any time?
pricing__faq__change_plans__answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and we'll prorate any billing adjustments.
pricing__faq__free_trial__question: Is there a free trial for the Pro plan?
pricing__faq__free_trial__answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for the Pro plan. No credit card required to start.
pricing__faq__payment_methods__question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing__faq__payment_methods__answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express). All payments are processed securely through Stripe.
pricing__faq__cancel_subscription__quest: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
pricing__faq__cancel_subscription__answe: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
pricing__faq__annual_discount__question: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
pricing__faq__annual_discount__answer: Yes! Save 20% when you choose annual billing. Contact our sales team for custom enterprise pricing options.
pricing__cta__subtitle: Join the developers already using reece-start to build their SaaS applications.
